    Use LdapUserRepository#EXTERNAL_SYSTEM_ID_DEFAULT_LDAP where possible. All LDAP specifics should be moved to the ldap plugin.

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.QueryParameters.addSortField(String, String, String)
    Use a sort field in the parameters and do the rendering of the sortfield in the associated query
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.QueryParameters.addSortField(String, String, String, String)
    Use a sort field in the parameters and do the rendering of the sortfield in the associated query
    com.communote.server.core.security.SecurityHelper.assertCurrentKenmeiUser()
    this method should not be used since it returns the user entity which can be an uninitialized hibernate proxy. Use SecurityHelper.assertCurrentUserId() instead and pass the returned userId together with an appropriate Converter (which is in most cases not the IdentityConverter!) to UserManagement.getUserById.
    com.communote.server.core.tag.TagManagement.createTag(String)
    Use createTag(Tag tag) instead.
    com.communote.server.core.query.QueryManagement.executeQuery(Query<L, T>, T)
    Use QueryManagement.query(Query, QueryParameters, QueryResultConverter) instead.
    com.communote.server.core.tag.TagManagement.findOrCreateTag(String)
    Use findOrCreateTag(Tag tag) instead.
    com.communote.server.core.user.UserManagement.findUserByUserId(Long)
    Use UserManagement.getUserById(Long, Converter) instead.
    com.communote.server.api.core.blog.MinimalBlogData.getBlogId()
    Use IdentifiableEntityData.getId()
    com.communote.server.core.common.velocity.CommunoteTool.getBlogs()
    Use CommunoteTool.getTopics() instead.
    com.communote.server.api.core.config.ClientConfigurationProperties.getLdapConfiguration()
    use UserService.getExternalSystemConfiguration(String)
    com.communote.server.api.ServiceLocator.getService(String)
    Use ServiceLocator.getService(Class) or ServiceLocator.getService(String, Class) instead.
    com.communote.server.core.blog.export.PermalinkGenerator.getTagLink(String)
    Use PermalinkGenerator.getTagLink(long) instead.
    com.communote.server.core.blog.export.PermalinkGenerator.getTagLink(String, boolean)
    Use PermalinkGenerator.getTagLink(long, boolean) instead.
    com.communote.server.widgets.Widget.getTile(String)
    user #getViewIdentifier(String) instead
    com.communote.server.widgets.annotations.AnnotatedSingleResultWidget.getTile(String)
    com.communote.server.widgets.annotations.AnnotatedMultiResultWidget.getTile(String)
    com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.management.user.group.GroupSettingsWidget.getTile(String)
    com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.tag.TagManagementWidget.getTile(String)
    com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.blog.EditTopicStructureWidget.getTile(String)
    com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.blog.DeleteTopicWidget.getTile(String)
    com.communote.server.api.core.user.UserData.getUserId()
    Use IdentifiableEntityData.getId()
    com.communote.server.core.user.UserProfileManagement.getUserProfileDetailsById(Long)
    Use UserProfileManagement.getUserProfileDetailsById(Long, boolean) instead.
    com.communote.server.core.tag.TagManagementImpl.handleFindOrCreateTag(String)
    Use TagManagementImpl.storeTag(TagTO) instead.
    com.communote.server.api.core.config.ClientConfigurationProperties.isConfluenceAuthenticationActivated()
    use UserService.getExternalSystemConfiguration(String)
    com.communote.server.api.core.config.ClientConfigurationProperties.isLdapAuthenticationActivated()
    use ClientConfigurationProperties.getExternalSystemConfigurations()
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.QueryParameters.needTransformListItem()
    Use Converter instead.
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.Query.postQueryExecution(I, PageableList)
    Use Converter instead.
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.user.v1_0_1.UserTaggingCoreQuery.postQueryExecution(UserTaggingCoreQueryParameters, PageableList)
    com.communote.server.api.core.blog.MinimalBlogData.setBlogId(Long)
    Use IdentifiableEntityData.setId(Long)
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.TaggingCoreItemUTPExtension.setBlogId(Long)
    Use TaggingCoreItemUTPExtension.setBlogFilter(java.lang.Long[]) instead.
    com.communote.server.api.core.user.UserData.setUserId(Long)
    Use IdentifiableEntityData.setId(Long)
    com.communote.server.web.commons.viewtool.UrlTool.tag(String)
    Use UrlTool.tag(long) instead.
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.QueryParameters.transformResultItem(Object)
    Use Converter instead.
    com.communote.server.core.vo.query.user.UserQueryParameters.transformResultItem(Object)
    User UserToUserDataQueryResultConverter instead.
